      • setService

        public void setService(SipService aService)

      • isCreated

        public boolean isCreated()

      • tryToLoadStack

        public boolean tryToLoadStack()

      • sipStart

        public boolean sipStart()
                 throws SameThreadException
        Start the sip stack Thread safing of this method must be ensured by upper layer Every calls from pjsip that require start/stop/getInfos from the underlying stack must be done on the same thread
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • sipStop

        public boolean sipStop()
                throws SameThreadException
        Stop sip service
        返回:
        true if stop has been performed
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • makeCall

        public int makeCall(java.lang.String callee,
                    Bundle b)
             throws SameThreadException
        Make a call
        参数:
        callee - remote contact ot call If not well formated we try to add domain name of the default account
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • callAnswer

        public int callAnswer(int callId,
                      int code)
               throws SameThreadException
        Answer a call
        参数:
        callId - the id of the call to answer to
        code - the status code to send in the response
        返回:
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • startRecording

        public void startRecording(int callId,
                           int way)
                    throws SameThreadException
        Start recording of a call.
        参数:
        callId - the call id of the call to record
        抛出:
        SameThreadException - virtual exception to be sure we are calling this from correct thread

      • isRecording

        public boolean isRecording(int callId)
                    throws SameThreadException
        Are we currently recording the call?
        参数:
        callId - The call id to test for a recorder presence
        返回:
        true if recording this call
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • canRecord

        public boolean canRecord(int callId)
        Can we record for this call id ?
        参数:
        callId - The call id to record to a file
        返回:
        true if seems to be possible to record this call.

      • stopRecording

        public void stopRecording(int callId)
                   throws SameThreadException
        Stop recording of a call.
        参数:
        callId - the call to stop record for.
        抛出:
        SameThreadException - virtual exception to be sure we are calling this from correct thread

      • playWaveFile

        public void playWaveFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                         int callId,
                         int way)
                  throws SameThreadException
        Play one wave file in call stream.
        参数:
        filePath - The path to the file we'd like to play
        callId - The call id we want to play to. Even if we only use SipManager.BITMASK_IN this must correspond to some call since it's used to identify internally created player.
        way - The way we want to play this file to. Bitmasked value that could be compounded of SipManager.BITMASK_IN (read local) and SipManager.BITMASK_OUT (read to remote party of the call)
        抛出:
        SameThreadException - virtual exception to be sure we are calling this from correct thread

      • startWaittoneGenerator

        public void startWaittoneGenerator(int callId)

      • stopWaittoneGenerator

        public void stopWaittoneGenerator(int callId)

      • stopPlaying

        public void stopPlaying(int callId)
                 throws SameThreadException
        Stop eventual player for a given call.
        参数:
        callId - the call id corresponding to player previously created with playWaveFile(String, int, int)
        抛出:
        SameThreadException - virtual exception to be sure we are calling this from correct thread

      • getRxTxLevel

        public long getRxTxLevel(int port)
        Get the signal level
        参数:
        port - The pjsip port to get signal from
        返回:
        an encoded long with rx level on higher byte and tx level on lower byte
